hero.tagline: Scaling startups and established eCommerce brands to 7 figures and beyond.

services.title: What we do
services.subtitle: We deliver eCommerce solutions that drive real results.
services.auditDesc: In-depth eCommerce audit covering branding, store design, UX, performance, and conversion gaps. We analyze your online store and customer journey, then deliver clear, actionable insights.
services.designDesc: High-converting, mobile-first Shopify and eCommerce design focused on usability, speed, and scalability. We build clean, conversion-driven layouts that turn visitors into customers.
services.marketingDesc: Data-driven eCommerce marketing focused on traffic, customer acquisition, and revenue growth. We use ads, funnels, and retention systems to drive consistent sales.
services.analyticsDesc: Advanced eCommerce analytics and conversion rate optimization to improve performance. We track behavior, test improvements, and optimize your store for higher conversions.
services.brandingDesc: eCommerce branding and visual design that builds trust and consistency. We create strong brand identity and UI systems aligned across your store and marketing.
services.ctaTitle: Instead of searching for freelancers and managing chaos, you get a ready-built
services.ctaReady: Ready to start a new store or boost your existing sales?

storeAudit.title: Unlock your store's full
storeAudit.subtitle: Get a comprehensive analysis of your ecommerce store with actionable insights to boost conversions and revenue.
storeAudit.comprehensiveDesc: Deep dive into your store's performance, UX, and conversion funnels.
storeAudit.growthDesc: Identify untapped revenue potential and optimization strategies.
storeAudit.issueDesc: Find technical issues, broken links, and performance bottlenecks.
storeAudit.actionDesc: Get a prioritized roadmap with specific implementation steps.
storeAudit.modalDesc: Enter your store URL below to get started with a comprehensive analysis.

contact.subtitle: Every client matters to us. Reach out to discuss your eCommerce goals.

improveStore.title: Improve Store
improveStore.subtitle: Done-for-you eCommerce services to increase sales.

auditReport.analyzingDesc: This may take a few moments
auditReport.scoreBasedOn: Based on UX, CRO, SEO, trust, and marketing setup
auditReport.revenueWhatMeansDesc: These percentages show how much of your monthly revenue loss comes from each issue. We compared your store to similar successful stores in your industry to calculate these numbers. The higher the percentage, the more money you're losing from that specific problem.
auditReport.domainSubdomain: Your store is using a Shopify subdomain
auditReport.domainSubdomainDesc: Your store URL ({{url}}) is a Shopify subdomain (*.myshopify.com). This can hurt trust, SEO, and branding compared to a custom domain (e.g. www.yourbrand.com).
auditReport.domainSubdomainList1: Customers may perceive myshopify.com URLs as less professional or less trustworthy.
auditReport.domainSubdomainList2: Search engines and backlinks benefit more from a consistent branded domain.
auditReport.domainSubdomainList3: Email and ads look more credible when they point to your own domain.
auditReport.domainRecommendation: Connect a custom (branded) domain in Shopify: Settings → Domains. Add your domain, then point your DNS to Shopify. Once connected, set it as the primary domain so your store uses your branded URL instead of the .myshopify.com subdomain.
auditReport.ctaTitle: Want us to fix these issues and recover lost revenue?
auditReport.ctaSubtitle: Limited audit fixes available per month
auditReport.fixItManualDesc: A step-by-step implementation guide for tech-savvy store owners who want to fix every issue from this audit themselves and recover lost revenue.
auditReport.bestUsed: Best used while your audit results are fresh.
auditReport.fixItList1: Clear checklist of what to fix first to stop revenue leaks.
auditReport.fixItList2: Actionable steps for UX, trust, SEO, product pages and tracking.
auditReport.fixItList3: Ideal for tech-savvy founders who prefer to implement everything in-house.
auditReport.fixItUrgent: Every week you wait with these issues live means more lost sales. Use this manual to fix them fast before you scale ads or traffic.
